name: Steven's Signal Saga
description:
Steven's Signal Saga is my submission for the GDA Jam with the theme "No signal".

In this game, Steven gets no signal on his cellphone, and you must help him along his journey to find a cell tower so he can make an Important call.

This can be played in the browser, or as an executable file.

Controls:

WASD to Explore
<> to Move Camera
Scrollwheel to Zoom in/out
Tab to Pause
